textBeforeTable: Subcategory: B - Bohemian Pilsener Category: 2 - Pilsner Style (BJCP) Decoction 122 for 30 min , 145-146 for 30 , and 152-153 for 30 . Pitch WLP802 if you can get it Notes Classic pilsner strain from the premier pilsner producer in the Czech Republic. Somewhat dry with a malty finish, this yeast is best suited for European pilsner production. White Labs WLP800 Pilsner Lager White Labs WLP800 Pilsner Lager Very mild. 'Noble'. Czech Saaz 2 oz Czech Saaz - 5.0 AA% pellets; boiled 1 min Mild, slightly spicy. 'Noble'. Tettnanger 1.25 oz Tettnanger - 4.8 AA% pellets; boiled 15 min Very mild. 'Noble'. Czech Saaz 1.25 oz Czech Saaz - 5.5 AA% pellets; boiled
